name: Cote Canal

reviews.text: We spent 3 nights (June 4-7) at the start of a 2-week Bruges,Paris,Brussels vacation. Every room at this charming B & B is decorated with impeccable taste -- Caroline could have another career as an interior decorator!! - we were able to see 3 rooms (I stayed in the attic room with my daughter & a friend stayed in both the La Charpente & Clin d’Oeil rooms). In addition to the large, spotlessly clean rooms Caroline provides all of the amenities of a 5-star hotel -- bathrobes, slippers, high quality toiletries, refrigerator, coffee/tea maker & Belgium chocolates. The location on the canal is stunning as is Caroline's garden. Breakfast is sumptuous with a wide selection of pastries, breads, cheeses, meats, eggs, cereals, & jams & honey from Belgium -- also freshly squeezed orange juice - the breakfast room is beautiful or you can choose to eat in the garden. Caroline is passionate about her job & a perfectionist regarding her B & B. She has definitely worked hard to discover the "formula" for running a successful B & B. Thank you Caroline for a beautiful stay in your amazing home!
reviews.title: Wonderful B & B in a charming medieval town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This has to be my favourite B&B in the whole world!!!! Quality of a 5 star hotel, friendliness of a B&B with 1 bedroom, Space for the whole family all in their own amazingly designed boutique rooms. Exactly like a Mr & Mrs Boutique Hotel! Caroline is amazing and lives to ensure your stay is awesome. We booked to go back in December.
reviews.title: The only place to stay in Bruges

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I just returned from a two week vacation to London, Brugge and Paris. While in Brugge we spent June 4 through June 7 at this amazing B&B, or more appropriately, Caroline’s house. The bottom line is we very highly recommend this B&B and as others continue to write, it is actually quite difficult to add anything new to the reviews. We will say, having stayed at many B&B’s throughout our years of travels, we have never found a better B&B anywhere. Those of you that want even more justification to stay at Cote Canal can read on.
reviews.title: Doesn't get any better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - There can be no more gracious, friendly, and helpful hostess than Caroline
reviews.title: There's a reason for all those 5 star ratings

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Our room (Suite Clair de lune) was spotless and well appointed - having old world charm without sacrificing modern amenities.
reviews.title: Great B&B

reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. THE perfect base from which to visit Bruges. Caroline is helpful, knowledgeable and a source of accurate, sensible and relevant advice - take it. As for "Fidel" he just watches-but beautifully too! Breakfast is plentiful and of a very high quality, setting you up for the day perfectly. (especially if your lucky enough to be able to utilise the charming garden, which we were).
reviews.title: Exquisite

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was of very high standard in all areas, comfort, cleanliness and furnishings so stop reading and book it now before someone else does.
reviews.title: Truly exceptional in every way.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As stated in the title, Cote Canal is truly an exceptional B&B.
reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic 超级棒

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms, garden and site are beautiful and the owner, Caroline, made our stay here perfect. She's welcoming, professional and knowledgeable.
reviews.title: Wondeful place and wonderful host
Fabulous
reviews.text: 位置极佳，临近canal和大广场，夏日晴朗的早晨可以在主人自家布满鲜花的大花园中享用丰富的早餐。住的房间叫clin d'eil，很大很宽敞！以后一定会再次光顾！Very admirable room, friendly host, nice location, brilliant breakfast, more than words can describe! Every detail is taken care of!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Caroline takes care of his cozy B&B really well, making the stay easy and pleasant. Definitely recommend if you are looking for a small (although my room - La Charpentre - was really big) and charming place to stay. Great breakfast too.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.text: We stayed here in May and I wish I could move in permanently!!! Beautifully appointed B&B, so quiet and so clean - it was a wish come true. Caroline was born to run a B&B, gives you all her time, is never rushed and we are planning a trip back. It was a truly relaxing experience.
reviews.title: Magnifique!

reviews.text: Do book early as this little jewel is not a secret any more.
reviews.title: Excellent stay!

reviews.text: All I would say if you are considering staying at Cote Canal is "book your reservation now!" Everything is perfectly done - from the rooms to the elegant morning breakfast. Luckily the weather was also perfect during the three days I stayed here so I was able to have breakfast in the gorgeous garden by the canal. Caroline is the quintessential hostess - always there for help and advice, but also gives you privacy to savor your time in her home and in Bruges. A truly world-class B&B.
reviews.title: Wonderful B&B in Bruges

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All the positive reviews are well deserved, Cote Canal is the place to stay in Bruges. Our family of 2 adults and our teenage son had the privilege of staying at Caroline's B&B and we couldn't have asked for a better place. Caroline's warmth and hospitality made all the difference and her house was just as lovely. Caroline's dog, Fidel, is a celebrity in his own right as tourists take photos of him sleeping in his little corner by the window. Thank you Caroline for such a wonderful stay!
reviews.title: Just wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our stay in this most beautiful guesthouse was made all the more memorable because of Caroline; she was the perfect host in this most picturesque setting. We were made to feel welcome from the moment of our arrival & benefited immediately from Caroline's love & enthusiasm for Bruges. The garden is a space of tranquility & visual delight; the house has great charm & our room was spacious, very comfortable and beautifully furnished. Canal Cote offers a haven of peace & beauty - it is the most perfect place to stay in this magnificent medieval city.
reviews.title: A haven of tranquility & beauty

reviews.text: My wife and I had the pleasure of staying at Cote Canal in July 2013. There are simply not enough words to describe the amazing hospitality we received from Caroline. Her attention to detail and passionate care for each guest is beyond compare. We have stayed at many European B&B's and Cote Canal surpasses any of our previous experiences. We look forward to returning for a longer stay in the future. Our room was very comfortable and adorned in beautiful period details with modern conveniences. We enjoyed having a delicious breakfast, lovingly prepared by Caroline, in the beautiful garden terrace overlooking the canal. In the evening we relaxed to the sounds of classical music permeating the downstairs living space while enjoying some Belgian chocolate. As dog lovers we cherished the private moments we were able to play and pet their resident Labrador Retriever, Fidel. If you are looking for an elegant, tranquil, romantic, and truly unique experience then I can't recommend this B&B enough. It's like a page out of a fairy tale that you'll want to revisit again and again.
reviews.title: Best B&B ever!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well i said i would be back in August and we were for 6 nights this time with full sun and no snow..!
reviews.title: Still the best IN BRUGES.......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nothing has changed and all the better for that , everything was just as good as before THATS why we booked the week in for August in January before we even left ...............PLEASE READ the review from then all still applies .
reviews.title: Highly recommended place to stay in Bruges - an absolute gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: No one would be disappointed staying here .
reviews.title: What a great place to stay in Bruges!

description: Exclusive Guesthouse - Unique Location! Along one of the most picturesque canals in between the two oldest bridges of town. All of our rooms offer a view on garden and canal. But we offer more than a room: the garden with terrace, the lounge and the dining room are all yours.Official classification: de luxe
